Hi all, I was flicking through 4 Aito ( I think this is the title ) Magazines/Catalogues I recieved today and am looking at a very long inscription that consists of  11 charactures and a Kao. I am working on the inscription ( should keep me busy for day's ) but am wondeing, when did Kao come into use on Sword mei ?, was this a Shinto or Shinshinto thing ? or did it happen in the earlier periods ?.

This sword is dated ???? ????  the 4th year of Bunsei ( 1821 ) I will have to work on the front section, I assume it is a month or something. The mei will take a lot longer :-)

cheers all

Rich
